amendment.description: to improve the credit for Ready Reserve-National Guard employees, to provide a credit for replacement employees of Ready Reserve-National Guard employees called to active military duty, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3123 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S5200-5204) to improve the credit for Ready Reserve-National Guard employees, to provide a credit for replacement employees of Ready Reserve-National Guard employees called to active military duty, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3123 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3123 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
